Tartarus

The recipe for success

27 Oct 2017

I recently reread some of my old blog posts, and found one where I talked about what I thought the keys to success were: self-awareness, patience, and work ethic. I am habitually impatient, my work ethic sucks, and I'm not very self aware. But every day I am going to try and be a little bit better at each one than I was the day before.
